title: Love Hina Christmas Special: Silent Eve
title_jp: ラブひなクリスマススペシャル 〜サイレント・イヴ〜
synopsis: As another round of preliminary tests approach for Keitaro, so does Christmas. And as the first Christmas of the millenium, there is a rumor that if one confesses his love on this special eve it will come true. Keitaro has decided what he needs to do on this Christmas eve, but being a retaker can he afford taking attention away from the tests on the same day...
